NL_ANT_01.description: Edge of the sternum at the 1st rib

NL_ANT_02.description: Between 2 and 3rd sibs,  each side of the sternum

NL_ANT_03.description: Between the 3rd and 4th ribs on each side of the breastbone

NL_ANT_03_04.description: Between the 3rd and 4th, and 4th and 5th ribs on each side of the breastbone

NL_ANT_05_15.description: On the shoulder, on the inside teh top forward part of the iliac crest

NL_ANT_Z5_16.description: Upper edge of pubic bone + Points each side of the navel

NL_ANT_06.description: 3 cun each side of the sternum, between 2nd and 3rd ribs

NL_ANT_07.description: Between 2 and 3rd sibs, 3 cun each side of the sternum

NL_ANT_14.description: On the left side, between teh 7th and 8th ribs, near the rib margin

NL_ANT_18.description: 2 cun above the navel, 1 cun each  side of the body

NL_ANT_8.description: Behind the nipple, betwenn the 4th and 5th ribs

NL_ANT_Z1_02.description: Between 2nd and 3rd ribs near the Sternum ; On the front of the upper arm

NL_ANT_Z2.description: On the left side, between teh 5th and 6th ribs.

NL_ANT_Z2d.description: On the right side, between teh 5th and 6th ribs.

NL_ANT_Z5.description: Upper edge of the pubic bone

NL_ANT_Z6_15.description: Inside of upper thight, and point at the upper part of the hip

NL_ANT_Z7.description: From teh top of the thigh bone, down just above the knee on the outside, front of the legs

NL_ANT_Z9.description: At the shoulder creasese, the Raglan Sleeves

NL_POST_C2.description: At C2, each side of the spine

NL_POST_C7_D1_Z1.description: Between C7 and T1 each side of the spine + center of the Teres muscles in the border of the scapula

NL_POST_D10_D11_D12.description: Between T10-T12, 1 cun each side of the spide at the last ribs

NL_POST_D12_L1.description: Between T12 and L1, each side of the spine

NL_POST_D2_D3.description: Between T2 and T3, each side of the spine

NL_POST_D3_D5.description: between T3 and T4, T4 and T5,  1 cun each side of the spine

NL_POST_D4_D5.description: between T3 and T4 1 cun each side of the spine

NL_POST_D5_D6.description: Between T5 and T6, each side of the spine

NL_POST_D5_D6d.description: Between T5 and T6 to the right side of the spine

NL_POST_D7_D8.description: Between T7 and T8, each side of the spine

NL_POST_D8_D11.description: Between T8 and T12, each side of the spine

NL_POST_L2.description: At L2, each side of the spine

NL_POST_L5.description: At L5, each side of the spine

NL_POST_Z2.description: Just below the points of the shoulder blade, between 8th and 9th ribs

NL_POST_Z3.description: the fleshy triangles between L2 L4 and the highest part of the hipbones

NL_POST_Z4.description: The prominent knobs on the hip bones at the level of L5

NV12_FACE.description: At the start of the hair, two inches from the median line

NV14_Face+NV16_DOS_Genou.description: Back of the knee + Sternoclavicular joint

NV7_PROFIL.description: 1 cun after the external eye angle

NV8_PROFIL.description: level with the ear, at the end of the mandible

NV8_PROFIL+NV15_16Face.description: level with the ear, at the end of the mandible + Sternal notch

alarm.description: Sur la ligne médiane, dans le creux au milieu du sillon mentonier
Sur la ligne médiane, 2 pouces au dessous du 14 VC, 4 pouces au dessus de l'ombilic
Bilatéralement, à l'extrémité libre de la 11eme cote, 2 pouces au dessus de la ligne horizontale passant pas l'ombilic
sur la ligne médiane, sous la pointe de l'apophyse xiphoïde, 6 pouces au dessus de l'ombilic
Sur la ligne médiane, 3 pouces au dessous de l'ombilic
Sur la ligne médiane, 4 pouces au dessous de l'ombilic
Bilatéralement, à l'extrémité de la 12eme côte
Sur la ligne médiane, au niveau de la ligne inter mamelonnaire
Sur la ligne médiane, 2 pouces au dessous de l'ombilic
Bilatéralement à la verticale du mammelon, sous le rebord de la sixième côte
Bilatéralement à la verticale du mammelon, sous le rebord de la septième côte
Bilatéralement, sous la seconde côte, à de pouces de la ligne mammelonaire.
Bilatéralement, à 2 pouces de chaque coté de l'ombilic
